christmas day is awful because instead of just doing christmas at home, everyone tries to do their christmas party at my workplace so we'll have like 15 different christmas parties going on at the same time and many of those people are assholes about it lmao

we have a no outside food sign but we just stop caring every december lmao. people will outright ignore the sign and be like "What, you wont let me bring a whole ass thanksgiving feast in here?!?!?" lol
Part of the Christmas Spirit is blatantly ignoring rules of your local business
